content: It's here you'll find one last Monk Supporter guarding a **Treasure Chest** , but this is no ordinary chest, as it contains the **Fiery Gourd**! Though it cannot be upgraded, drinking from it will help keep any chill effects at bay, and also increase your maximum Stamina. As an added bonus, and it can also hold two different Soaks!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White'.
The content is as follows:
It's here you'll find one last Monk Supporter guarding a **Treasure Chest** , but this is no ordinary chest, as it contains the **Fiery Gourd**! Though it cannot be upgraded, drinking from it will help keep any chill effects at bay, and also increase your maximum Stamina. As an added bonus, and it can also hold two different Soaks!
